privacy.policy1: BetoTech Digital Solutions respects your privacy and is committed to protecting the personal data of its users, in accordance with the General Data Protection Law (Law No. 13.709/2018 – LGPD). We collect only the information strictly necessary to improve your experience on our site, respond to contact requests, and offer our services with quality.

privacy.policy5: Under the LGPD, you may request, at any time: access, review, update, or deletion of your personal data, except in cases where there is a legal obligation to retain them. To exercise your rights, contact us through the channels provided on our site.

quemSomos.texto: BetoTech Digital Solutions is me, Gilberto Silva, a developer passionate about technology and innovation. I work alone, but with the dedication of someone who wears the jersey for every project. My goal is to create websites, systems, and custom digital solutions focused on what truly matters: the growth and success of my clients. At BetoTech, every line of code is crafted with care and attention, combining modern design and performance. More than delivering a service, I give my best in every detail, ensuring each project has identity, functionality, and impact.
